name: refrelid

stmt.origin: mpbir2an(wrefrel(cid), wss(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cid), crn(cid))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cid), crn(cid)))), wrel(cid))

body.origin:
|- wrefrel(cid)
-| wss(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cid), crn(cid))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cid), crn(cid))))
-| wrel(cid)
-| wb(wrefrel(cid), wa(wss(cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cid), crn(cid))), cin(cid, cxp(cdm(cid), crn(cid)))), wrel(cid)))

-| wrel(cid)
